context: Hello! What kind of movies are you interested in?
Hi, I'm looking for something fun to watch. Maybe like Frozen (2013)
resp: That is a good movie! If you want something fun, how about Tangled (2010) ? It is animated also. Or, you might like to see The Lego Batman Movie (2017) . I enjoyed that when we took our son to see it.
